comment: I genuinely should not have passed this class but professor jones is so kind when grading. I am not a great researcher by any means, and although I got a C, I could've gotten worse but she helps so much and is an easy grader. I owe her so much if I ever get to see her in person!

Professor Jones is sweet and caring. The class is compiled of 5 quizzes, 15 discussion posts and 1 literature review project. You work on sections of the paper throughout the whole class in sections. RQ & Sources, Introduction, Lit Review, Analysis of Findings, and then you have your final paper completed. Always answers emails and is so helpful!
Really easy class and a great professor. Work load is very doable and she is very easy to reach via email. Take her!!

She's really caring , you can reach her through email she replies quickly . The whole class is based off discussion posts, a couple of quizzes , but throughout the semester you are writing your final paper . This class wasn't hard at all , but of course when you're writing a paper it is time consuming . I loved her . I would chose her again 100% .

Professor Jones was one of the most caring teachers I've ever had. Her class is easy, educational, and she gives amazing feedback on all assignments so you do your best. If something happened she is very understanding and gives you more time to complete your work. We used a workbook for some discussion posts but it was free. I strongly recommend!

This class is great. Professor Jones does a great job and makes the class manageable. I actually learned a good bit in this class. Love the structure of the class. If you prefer papers over tests take her!
Class was straightforward. You are essentially working on a big paper through the year and she helps you make it perfect.

This class wasn't too hard - she breaks it down into weekly chunks that are manageable. A weekly discussion post related to the progress on the lit review and the lit review itself is completed in sections. She gives detailed feedback for making changes and lets you resubmit for a better grade. 5 quizzes can be found on Quizlet. Take her!

Great class. She made a lit review really easy to manage. She does everything she can to make the steps understandable. All of the assignments are related to the paper and are designed to give you a leg up on the paper. Do them! She's very helpful. There are a few quizzes but what really matters is the paper.

Modules & discussions every week. Gives detailed feedback on all of your work, is so caring & overall one of the best/easiest online classes I've ever had. Her instructions are clear and it is never too much work. She responds to emails immediately & is so nice to students. She genuinely wants everyone to succeed. Take her!!!
She is a great professor! She gives a week to do a module and the modules are not hard nor that long! Take her!!
